name: Kioku Card Game
description:
Find all pairs of cards in the board !

Try to find all pairs of cards by memorizing cards locations at each turn. Once the board is empty, the player who gets the most pairs wins !

2-4 players

Mouse Controls:

  • Right button to turn hovered card

Keyboard Controls :

  • Keyboard arrows to pick a card

  • Enter or Spacebar to turn the selected card

  • R key to restart the game

Gamepad Controls:

  • Dpad to select a card

  • A button to turn selected card
